title: Alex Jones Show - 2010 Mar 28 SU [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Sunday, 28 March 2010


[sebaygo1]




The 2 hour Sunday show is typically a review of the past week's news and a look forward to the coming week's events.


+++ HOWEVER, this show consists entirely of 
previously broadcast material, described on
the web site as :::


"On this Sunday Edition encore presentation, Alex talks with former New Jersey Superior Court Judge Andrew Napolitano about Obamacare and the Constitution, Texas congressman Ron Paul, the former deputy attorney general of Pennsylvania and attorney who challenged Obama's presidency on the birth issue, Philip J. Berg, and English journalist and novelist James Delingpole."





_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/
 
 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume support or endorsement on my
 part of all contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.

 !! please try some of the other shows I upload too !!
